title: Design & Branding
description: Distinctive aesthetics, custom typography, and video support

requirements.title: Aesthetic guidelines in template
requirements.description: Template specification includes frontend_aesthetics block in description for design agents
requirements.notes: Embed aesthetic guidelines in template.json metadata so agents always see them

requirements.title: Custom typography
requirements.description: Default template declares custom font stack (not Inter, Roboto, Arial, or system default)
requirements.notes: Use Google Fonts or Bunny Fonts: Sora, Space Grotesk, Work Sans, etc.

requirements.title: CSS theming
requirements.description: Template uses defined CSS variables for colors and spacing

requirements.title: Non-trivial backgrounds
requirements.description: Template includes at least one layered gradient/shape/texture background (not flat solid)
requirements.notes: Use CSS gradients, SVG patterns, or layered divs with opacity

requirements.title: Video section support
requirements.description: Template supports at least one video demo section (URL, thumbnail, caption, layout) configurable via admin
requirements.notes: Support YouTube/Vimeo embeds; admin form: video_url, thumbnail_url, caption, layout (full-width|split)
